entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
